setup.correct_feedback: Congratulations! You have successfully classified and saved your case for this simulation.
setup.incorrect_feedback: You have not selected the correct item for this scenario. Please review the scenario and try re-selecting.
setup.incomplete_feedback: You have missed a troubleshooting selection or a required text field. Please try again.
setup.disabled_msg: The element selected has been disabled in this simulation. Please try another element.

accessibility_labels.escape_text: Press the escape key to close this message.
accessibility_labels.enter_search_results: Search Affected Product. Instructions: type in your search word and press the down arrow key to enter search results.
accessibility_labels.tooltip_instructions: Press the tab key to expand more information about this issue.

topic.message: All fields are required unless marked otherwise.

field.placeholder: Enter topics or create a new one
field.errorMessage: You cannot leave this field empty

element.content: Reminder: Vote on an existing tracked issue or create a new one in Core Issue Tracker for this case. See CP1397.

element.name: osType
element.label: Is the customer using iCloud with iOS, macOS, or Windows?

element.label: Is the customer using Microsoft Outlook?

element.content: Standard Apple ID having 2 or 3 security question(s) and answer(s). Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Follow Handling Apple ID Password and Security Questions to troubleshoot the issue.
Higher security Apple ID that uses verification code, trusted phone number and trusted device. These accounts do not have security question(s) and answer(s). Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Follow Handling Apple ID Password and Security Questions to troubleshoot the issue.

Higher security Apple ID that uses Recovery Key, verification code, trusted phone number and trusted device. These accounts do not have security question(s) and answer(s). Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Follow Handling Apple ID Password and Security Questions to troubleshoot the issue.

element.name: appleIdSecurityType
element.label: Verify Customer's "Apple ID Security" type in iCloud Support App:

element.name: affectedService
element.label: What service is affected with the Apple ID issue?

option.value: iTunes Store, App Store, Mac App Store, iBookstore

element.content: This is a student (U13) account created by an educational institution. Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Standard Apple ID having 1 security question and answer. Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Follow Handling Apple ID Password and Security Questions to troubleshoot the issue.
Apple ID created, managed and owned by an Education institution. Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Standard Apple ID having 2 or 3 security question(s) and answer(s). Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Follow Handling Apple ID Password and Security Questions to troubleshoot the issue.
Higher security Apple ID that uses verification code, trusted phone number and trusted device. These accounts do not have security question(s) and answer(s). Please see CP1403 for guidance.
Follow Handling Apple ID Password and Security Questions to troubleshoot the issue.

Higher security Apple ID that uses Recovery Key, verification code, trusted phone number and trusted device. These accounts do not have security question(s) and answer(s). Please see CP1403 for guidance.
